alertDescription.value: PureFA Average Host Latency Alert will query the PureFA Host Performance logs which will provide the IO Latency based on the operations, as provided by PureFA in microseconds. This Alert will trigger when latency for the operations surpasses 10 ms.

query.value: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'purefa_host_performance_latency_usec' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend host = tostring(Json.host) | extend dimension = tostring(Json.dimension) | extend IO_Latency = Val | where IO_Latency > 0 | project TimeGenerated, host, dimension, IO_Latency, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId
